title: Estimating and determining particle motion part - d

content.question: Suppose that the acceleration of the particle is positive for 0<t<8 seconds. Explain why the position of the particle at t=8 seconds must be greater than x=30 meters.

frqParts.text: Suppose that the acceleration of the particle is positive for 0<t<8 seconds. Explain why the position of the particle at t=8 seconds must be greater than x=30 meters.

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
